Detailed Description

The Typeface class specifies the typeface and intrinsic style of a font.

This is used in the paint, along with optionally Paint settings like textSize, textSkewX, textScaleX to specify how text appears when drawn (and measured). 

 //draw text with specified font type
     paint.setTypeface(Typeface::defaultFromStyle(Typeface::BOLD_ITALIC));
     paint.setTextSize(40);
     canvas->drawText("Typeface Test!! - BOLD_ITALIC, size 40", 50, 200, paint);

Member Function Documentation

static Typeface gaia::graphics::Typeface::create ( const base::String &  familyName,
int32_t  style 
) [static]

Create a typeface object given a family name, and option style information.

The resulting typeface object can be queried (getStyle()) to discover what its "real" style characteristics are.

Parameters:
familyNameThe name of the font family.
styleThe style (normal, bold, italic) of the typeface. e.g. NORMAL, BOLD, ITALIC, BOLD_ITALIC
Returns:
The best matching typeface.
static Typeface gaia::graphics::Typeface::create ( const Typeface &  family,
int32_t  style 
) [static]

Create a typeface object that best matches the specified existing typeface and the specified Style.

Use this call if you want to pick a new style from the same family of an existing typeface object. If family is null, this selects from the default font's family.

Parameters:
familyThe name of the existing type face.
styleThe style (normal, bold, italic) of the typeface. e.g. NORMAL, BOLD, ITALIC, BOLD_ITALIC
Returns:
The best matching typeface.

const base::String &  path 
) [static]

Create a new typeface from the specified font data.

Parameters:
mgrThe application's asset manager
pathThe file name of the font data in the assets directory
Returns:
The new typeface or DEFAULT() if file not found.

The default NORMAL typeface object.

static const Typeface gaia::graphics::Typeface::DEFAULT_BOLD ( ) [static]

The default BOLD typeface object.

Note: this may be not actually be bold, depending on what fonts are installed. Call getStyle() to know for sure.

the default typeface that corresponds to the style

static void gaia::graphics::Typeface::setGammaForText ( float  blackGamma,
float  whiteGamma 
) [static]

Set the global gamma coefficients for black and white text.

This call is usually a no-op in shipping products, and only exists for testing during development.

Parameters:
blackGammagamma coefficient for black text
whiteGammagamma coefficient for white text
